long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Habito: 

Version: 1.0.0
Release Date: March 2024

What's New:
- Added complete user authentication system with Google OAuth
- Implemented secure data synchronization using Supabase backend
- Added policy pages (Privacy Policy, Terms of Service, and Refund Policy)
- Improved UI/UX with smoother animations and transitions
- Optimized performance with code splitting and lazy loading

Habito transforms your Chrome new tab into a beautiful, mindful habit-tracking sanctuary. Unlike traditional habit trackers, Habito uses the power of visualization to make building habits engaging and rewarding.

Every time you open a new tab, you'll be reminded of your goals and progress in a visually appealing way. Watch your virtual garden flourish as you develop positive habits and create lasting change in your life.
